title: alpah is gone?
body: did riot take the alpah down my icon and launcher is also gone?

replies.body:
It seems that for whatever reason, the shortcuts for the Alpha Client have been disappearing from some player's computers (including my own work computer). You should still have it installed and accessible inside your installation folder **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\)**

Let me know if this helped!
http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download try to download it back and see if it works or maybe it upgraded into your league of legends main game
I'm pretty sure Riot can't delete your League icon/launcher from your computer, so maybe you got a virus or deleted it yourself.
